title: MT5: Deposit (request)
description: This call allows deposit into MT5 account from Binary account.

amount.description: Amount to deposit (in the currency of from_binary); min = $1 or an equivalent amount, max = $20000 or an equivalent amount

from_binary.description: Binary account loginid to transfer money from

to_mt5.description: MT5 account login to deposit money to

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
